assessmentQuestionVersion.name: ElexacaftorTezacaftorIvacaftor_Renewal_Assessment_Q16
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: (Instructions: Fill in this page for all renewals. For patients ages 6 and older, renewal 1 is required at 6 months, Renewal 2 is at 12-18 months and the Renewals 3+ can be up to every 24 months. For patients ages 2 to 5 years, renewals are required every 12 months. Approval duration for Trikafta may be individualized based on the clinical circumstance).
